nodes.text: Klatooinians were a species native to the planet Klatooine, who often worked as henchmen and bounty hunters. Castas was a Klatooinian. Their natural habitat was desert or wastelands.

Skelly, a human character from A New Dawn, was originally conceived as a Klatooinian. Despite this, author John Jackson Miller felt that he had an appearance that was somewhat Klatooinian. Skelly had a Klatooinian prosthetic right hand.
